meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium; Video Conference Link: https://dallascityhall.webex.com/dallascityhall/j.php?MTID=med1cab3ffb6c13c23ec799b8ce196f7c

presenters: Kimberly Knight, MSSW, Director of Caregiver Support Program, Senior Source
Chiffon Kinney, RN, CGN, CM, BAAS, Senior Registered Nurse, Parkland Health, Community Senior’s Care
Mirka Norman, Supervisor- Community Care Services
Tabitha Taylor, Age-Friendly Officer, Office of Community Care and Empowerment

agenda_items.title: Public Speakers for items V- VII
Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes for the February 24, 2025 Senior Affairs Commission (SAC) Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: Reminder of Texas Open Meetings Act (TOMA) Requirements for Videoconference Meeting.

agenda_items.title: New Business: Presentation from Senior Source Caregiver Support Program
agenda_items.description: This presentation will explore the most pressing support needs of caregivers in our community, new initiatives, cultural factors, and how effective current systems are in addressing caregiver challenges.
agenda_items.presenter: Kimberly Knight, MSSW, Director of Caregiver Support Program, Senior Source

agenda_items.title: New Business: Presentation from Parkland Center for Geriatric Care and Healthy Aging
agenda_items.description: The presentation will address key health challenges faced by older adults, including preventive measures, caregiver support needs, resource gaps, and the impact of social factors on the healthcare system.
agenda_items.presenter: Chiffon Kinney, RN, CGN, CM, BAAS, Senior Registered Nurse, Parkland Health, Community Senior’s Care

agenda_items.title: Staff Reports/Briefings
agenda_items.description: Presentation by the Office of Community Care and Empowerment (OCCE) Senior Services. OCCE will provide a monthly update on services provided, programs, and contracts targeting the older residents of Dallas.
agenda_items.presenter: Mirka Norman, Supervisor- Community Care Services and Tabitha Taylor, Age-Friendly Officer, Office of Community Care and Empowerment

agenda_items.title: Reports of officers, boards, and standing committees
agenda_items.description: Senior Affairs Commissioners District updates by each Commissioner as needed.
